thread.title: Saif-Ranbir Turn Chefs, MJ's Album 'Thriller' Is The Best-Selling Album & More From Ent! - Indiatimes.com
thread.title_full: Saif-Ranbir Turn Chefs, MJ's Album 'Thriller' Is The Best-Selling Album & More From Ent! - Indiatimes.com

title: Saif-Ranbir Turn Chefs, MJ's Album 'Thriller' Is The Best-Selling Album & More From Ent! - Indiatimes.com
text:
1. Ranbir-Saif Impress Kareena & Karisma With Their Culinary Skills, Turn Chefs At A Family Dinner! 
Guess who was made in charge of the food? None other than Ranbir Kapoor and his brother-in-law Saif Ali Khan! While the sisters were busy posing for pictures, the handsome duo ensured that the food was cooked on time. 2. Saif Ali Khan Confirms KJo Will Launch Daughter Sara Because He's 'Brilliant' With Newcomers 
In an interview with Pinkvilla, Saif confirmed that Sara will indeed be launched under KJo's banner, he said, "I think she is going to. I am very happy she is working with Karan Johar because I think he is brilliant with newcomers and he will launch her correctly. He is a very intelligent and a passionate filmmaker and he understands films. I am very pleased that she is with him." 3. This Is How Rupali Ganguly AKA Monisha Is Preparing For Sarabhai VS Sarabhai's Second Season! 
In a report carried out by DNA, Rupali AKA Monisha talked about how she and her fellow colleagues are prepping up for the series. She said, “Since we were told that Sarabhai Vs Sarabhai will be making a comeback as a web series, all of us are trying to get back in shape. It’s been 11 years since we did the serial and all of us have grown, though not necessarily aged! However, except for me — I was 52 kilos when I did the serial and put on 36 kilos during my pregnancy — the others look the same, especially Sumeet. I hate him for that (laughs). In fact, I have told him I will lose 10 kilos and he should put on some so that we meet half-way.” 4. SRK Admits Not Knowing About Dirk Gently’s Holistic Detective Agency, Ends Up Getting A Role In It! 
twitter 
It seems like Shah Rukh Khan recently got to know about Dirk Gently’s Holistic Detective Agency, a popular science-fiction detective series that airs on BBC America, and so he posted on Twitter about the same. The tweet caught the attention of the show’s producer, who ended up offering him a guest appearance in the show. If their Twitter conversation is something to go by, King Khan has been roped in for the guest role already. 5. It's Official! Michael Jackson's 'Thriller' Is The Best-Selling Album Of All Times! 
the FW 
This is one album that people belonging to all generations listen even today. The songs are evergreen and even those who are not hardcore MJ’s fans would agree. Here’s an amazing news for all the die-hard Jackson fans. ‘Thriller’ has surpassed 30x million mark in terms of sales in USA and to mark this achievement, RIAA has officially given a Diamond Award to this album. Don't Miss
